  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/111509</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111509</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Zmanjšano merilo</string>
            <string language="en">Reducing the scale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verringern der Skala</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réduction de l'échelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reduzindo a escala</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riduzione della scala</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μείωση της κλίμακας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reducción de la escala</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenci ponovijo že znano o pomanjšanem merilu in utrjujejo s samostojnim delom.</string>
            <string language="en">Exercises that include understanding the scale of the map and drawing ground plan in given scale.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zemljevid</string>
            <string language="en">map</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">merilo</string>
            <string language="en">scale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">tloris</string>
            <string language="en">ground plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übungen, die das Verstehen der Skala der Karte 
und das Zeichnen des Grundplanes in gegebener Skala enthalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercices qui incluent l'arrangement l'échelle 
de la carte et du plan au sol de dessin dans l'échelle donnée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercícios que incluem a compreensão da escala 
do mapa e desenhar a planta à terra na escala dada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitazioni che includono capire la scala del 
programma e dissipare il programma al suolo in data scala.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασκήσεις που περιλαμβάνουν την κατανόηση της κλίμακας 
του χάρτη και το σχεδιασμό της κάτοψης θεμεκίων στη δεδομένη 
κλίμακα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ejercicios que incluyen entender la escala de la 
correspondencia y trazar el plan de tierra en escala dada.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Skala</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">carte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">échelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan au sol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mapa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escala</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta à terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scala</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma al suolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χάρτης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κλίμακα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κάτοψη θεμεκίων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">correspondencia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">escala</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">plan de tierra</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
